document.full_text: seven people were killed and 33 injured when government troops crushed a mutiny in a military camp in bobo dioulasso, 350 km from the burkina faso capital, officials said saturday.
document.title: troops crush burkina army mutiny, 7 dead: officials
lines_and_colors: seven people were killed and 33 injured when government troops crushed a mutiny in a military camp in bobo dioulasso, 350 km from the burkina faso capital, officials said saturday.
